title: Kenilworth Park & Aquatic Gardens: Park Home
body: Where Water and Wind Dance  In an age old dance wind, water, and land combine here.  Sparkling in the sun on a breezy day, this natural area of Anacostia Park has origins in a 1926 act of Congress to preserve the forests, water quality, and recreation value of the waterways of Washington, DC.  The park reflects the policies that affect rivers and wetlands.  Come, join the dance.            Welcome to Kenilworth Park and Aquatic Gardens   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:33 seconds  Discover lotus and lily flowers, wildlife, and more!                 Lotus and Lily Festival   The park hosts a festival every summer to celebrate the spectacular blooming of water lilies and lotuses.         Volunteer with the Park   Interested in volunteering? Volunteering is a great way to give back to the community and have fun.
